name: congresswoman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who belongs to a congress, especially a member of the US House of Representatives: The incumbent congresswoman is up for re-election. Compare
congressman
More examplesFewer examplesShe is a former Republican congresswoman.He criticized the congresswoman's vote.I'm going to speak with a congresswoman who represents Guam.The image shows four newly elected Democratic congresswomen.
